sect1.title: Update chapter01/changelog.xml
sect1.para: Changelog updates should always be provided with the exception of small typo fixes. You don't need to add "fixed small typo in XXX" to the changelog otherwise it'd grow like topsy.

Changelog updates need to be in a standard format. Here is an example: <listitem><para>April 29th, 2002 [markh]: Chapter 06 - Add D HCP_STOP variable to DHCP scripts.</para></listitem> Replace [markh] with your shadowfax login name.

Changelog entries are always added to the top of the file, just beneath the <itemizedlist> tag. They are cleaned out after major releases and always divided by the editor (me!) after each release. If you don't understand this, look at the LFS changelog for release 3.3 to see what I mean.
